title: Report: Amy Pieters Takes SD Worx-Protime to Court in ‘Indefinite Contract’ Dispute
content:
Dutchwoman pushes former team for pay after brain injuries sustained in devastating training crash forced her into premature retirement.

Read the full article at Report: Amy Pieters Takes SD Worx-Protime to Court in ‘Indefinite Contract’ Dispute on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
